fields.label: Allow Linking to Appointment Request Forms?
fields.name: appointment_request_query_system
fields.instructions: Grant the ability at the page level to display a link or dropdown to one or more online appointment request forms.

fields.label: Standalone Heading for Appointment Request Forms
fields.name: appointment_request_heading_standlone_system
fields.instructions: This heading text will be used when appointment request forms section is the only appointment option displayed.

fields.name: appointment_request_descr_standlone_system
fields.label: Standalone Description for Appointment Request Forms
fields.instructions:
This description text will be used when appointment request forms section is the only appointment option displayed.
This paragraph introduces the dropdown for selecting an appointment request form.
The paragraph should briefly describe what the user can do.
fields.default_value: Appointments for specialized care at this location cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.
fields.placeholder: Appointments for specialized care at this location cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.

fields.label: Nested Heading for Appointment Request Forms
fields.name: appointment_request_heading_nested_system
fields.instructions: This heading text will be used when UAMS Health MyChart Open Scheduling section is also displayed.

fields.name: appointment_request_descr_nested_system
fields.label: Nested Description for Appointment Request Forms
fields.instructions:
This description text will be used when MyChart Open Scheduling section is also displayed.
This paragraph introduces the dropdown for selecting an appointment request form.
The paragraph should briefly describe what the user can do.
fields.default_value: Some appointments at this location involve specialized care and cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.
fields.placeholder: Some appointments at this location involve specialized care and cannot be scheduled online. For those, submit a request for an appointment.

fields.name: appointment_request_btn_text_system
fields.label: Button Text for Appointment Request Forms
